firekit

University of Tasmania Fire Centre

An R package containing a variety of functions developed by the University of Tasmania Fire Centre. This includes functions for calculating a range of fire weather indices, calculating spatial landscape metrics over fire regime rasters, and a spatial model of urban-rural fire risk incorporating radiant heat and ember transport.

Package development was support by Natural Hazards Research Australia project Bushfire Risk a the Urban-Rural Interface.
